Body:
board = [[' ', ' ', 'C'], ['Z', ' ', ' '], [' ', 'Z', ' ']]
gene_as_board = [' ', ' ', 'C', 'Z', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Z', ' ']
ga = Genetic(board, direction='izquierda', number_individuals=2,
    number_generations=1, crossover=None, mutation_rate=5)
new_individuals = ga.first_birth(template=board, amount=2)
assert len(new_individuals) == 2
assert new_individuals[0].gene == gene_as_board and new_individuals[1
    ].gene == gene_as_board
